DOC.detailed_description: Patients schedule prospectively undergo total knee arthroplasty randomly assign receive either MIS-QS TKA MIS TKA . Proprioception knee position sense assess knee angle reproduction test ( 10~20 degree , 30~40 degree , 80~90 degree knee flexion ) prior operation , 1 week , 6 week , 3 month 6 month post operation .
